details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-4:2020 - 6.9 Embedded files
details.description: All of the embedded files shall be compliant with ISO 19005-1, 19005-2 or 19005-4

rule.description: All of the embedded files shall be compliant with ISO 19005-1, 19005-2 or 19005-4

error.message: An embedded file does not comply to either ISO 19005-1, ISO 19005-2 or ISO 19005-4
